title: Saudi Arabia:Prisoner of conscience convicted in ‘counter-terror purge’ of human rights (Amnesty International Australia)
text: ( Source : Amnesty International Australia ) The Saudi Arabian authorities today continued their cynical use of a repressive and overly vague counter-terrorism law to purge the Kingdom 's small and embattled civil society by convicting the
